heading: 1.1.1 Load the tidyverse
code:
library(tidyverse)
theme_set(theme_bw())

heading: 1.1.2 Read in the data
code:
weather <- read_csv("./data/ottawa-all-monthly.csv")

head(weather)## # A tibble: 6 x 9
##   Date.Time   Year Month Mean.Max.Temp.C. Mean.Min.Temp.C. Mean.Temp.C.
##   <date>     <dbl> <chr>            <dbl>            <dbl>        <dbl>
## 1 1889-11-01  1889 11                 4.6             -2.2          1.2
## 2 1889-12-01  1889 12                -1.7             -9.6         -5.7
## 3 1890-01-01  1890 01                -4.2            -15.5         -9.9
## 4 1890-02-01  1890 02                -3.7            -13.9         -8.8
## 5 1890-03-01  1890 03                -0.3             -9.3         -4.8
## 6 1890-04-01  1890 04                 9.9             -1.2          4.4
## # ... with 3 more variables: Total.Rain.mm. <dbl>, Total.Snow.cm. <dbl>,
## #   Total.Precip.mm. <dbl>

heading: 1.1.3 Inspect the data
code:
dim(weather)## [1] 1405    9
nrow(weather)## [1] 1405
ncol(weather)## [1] 9
names(weather)## [1] "Date.Time"        "Year"             "Month"            "Mean.Max.Temp.C."
## [5] "Mean.Min.Temp.C." "Mean.Temp.C."     "Total.Rain.mm."   "Total.Snow.cm."  
## [9] "Total.Precip.mm."
length(names(weather))## [1] 9

heading: 1.1.4 September
code:
September <- weather %>%
  filter(Month == "09")

heading: 1.1.5.1 Plot 1
code:
ggplot(September, aes(x=Date.Time, y=Mean.Max.Temp.C.))+
  geom_point()

heading: 1.1.5.2 Plot 2
code:
ggplot(September, aes(x=Date.Time, y=Mean.Max.Temp.C.))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method = "loess", formula = y ~ x)

heading: 1.1.5.3 Plot 3
code:
ggplot(September, aes(x=Date.Time, y=Mean.Max.Temp.C.))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_line(aes(colour=Year))

heading: 1.1.5.4 Plot 4
code:
ggplot(September, aes(x=Date.Time, y=Mean.Max.Temp.C.))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_line(aes(colour=Year))+
  geom_smooth(method = "loess" ,formula = y ~ x)

heading: 1.2.1 October
code:
October <- weather %>%
  filter(Month == "10")

heading: 1.2.2 Combine September and October
code:
SeptOct <- bind_rows(September, October)

dim(SeptOct)## [1] 234   9

heading: 1.2.3 Select columns
code:
SeptOct <- SeptOct %>%
  select(Year, Month, Mean.Max.Temp.C., Mean.Min.Temp.C., Total.Rain.mm., Total.Snow.cm.)

heading: 1.2.4 Make new variable
code:
SeptOctnew <- SeptOct %>%
  mutate(Total.precip = Total.Rain.mm. + Total.Snow.cm.*10)

heading: 1.2.5.1 Plot 1
code:
ggplot(SeptOctnew, aes(x=Year, y=Total.precip))+
  geom_point()

heading: 1.2.5.2 Plot 2
code:
ggplot(SeptOctnew, aes(x=Year, y=Total.precip))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method = "loess", formula = y ~ x)

heading: 1.2.5.3 Plot 3
code:
ggplot(SeptOctnew, aes(x=Year, y=Total.precip))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_line(aes(colour=Year))

heading: 1.2.5.4 Plot 4
code:
ggplot(SeptOctnew, aes(x=Year, y=Total.precip))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_line(aes(colour=Year))+
  geom_smooth(method = "loess", formula = y ~ x)

heading: 1.2.6 New plot
code:
ggplot(SeptOctnew, aes(x=Total.precip, y=Mean.Max.Temp.C.))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method = "loess", formula = y ~ x)

heading: 1.2.7 Fix that code
code:
ggplot(SeptOctnew, aes(x=Year, y=Total.precip), colour=Month)+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method = "loess", formula = y ~ x)
ggplot(SeptOctnew, aes(x=Year, y=Total.precip, colour=Month))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method = "loess", formula = y ~ x)

heading: 1.2.8 Facetting
code:
weather %>%
  filter(Month %in% c("09", "10", "11")) %>%
  mutate(Precipitation = Total.Rain.mm. + 25 * Total.Snow.cm.) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Year, y=Precipitation))+
  geom_line(aes(colour=Month))+
  geom_smooth(method = "loess", formula = y ~ x)+
  facet_wrap(~Month)
